name: Brass Nataraja Idol
description: Handcrafted brass Nataraja idol made by traditional artisans using the ancient lost-wax casting technique. Each piece is unique and represents the cosmic dance of Lord Shiva.

name: Carved Teak Elephant
description: Intricately hand-carved teak wood elephant with traditional Rajasthani motifs. A symbol of wisdom and good fortune, perfect for home decor.

name: Banarasi Silk Tapestry
description: Handwoven Banarasi silk tapestry featuring traditional floral and paisley patterns with gold zari work. A masterpiece representing centuries of weaving tradition.
